public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 ) || (absX >= 2768 && absX <= 2770 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 ) || (absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2761 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2761 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 3177 && absX <= 3277 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3455)|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

item.title: Wild Terrorty
item.dc:creator: @number-x number-x
item.description:
@number-x wrote:

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 ) || (absX >= 2768 && absX <= 2770 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 ) || (absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2761 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2761 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 3177 && absX <= 3277 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3455)||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}
